[[Hagoromo]] gathers [[senjutsu]]-enhanced [[lightning]] into his hand to thrust at the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto: Shinobi Collection Shippū Ranbu]]''.
* Vishnu is a [[wikipedia:Vishnu|Hindu god]] who creates, protects and transforms the universe.
